üìú About Me

Seasoned DevOps Engineer with over five years of expertise in streamlining and automating deployment processes across AWS and GCP environments. Demonstrated ability in leveraging advanced DevOps tools and methodologies to enhance operational efficiency and deployment velocity. Passionate about learning new technologies and sharing knowledge with others.

Key competencies include:

  • Orchestrating containerized applications with Kubernetes.
  • Implementing infrastructure as code using Terraform and Crossplane.
  • Designing robust CI/CD pipelines with a focus on efficiency and scalability.

Skilled in integrating a variety of modern DevOps technologies, including ArgoCD and Github Actions, to support continuous integration and delivery in dynamic cloud ecosystems. Committed to driving innovation through automation and delivering solutions in fast-paced environments.
